item.title: TTD
item.description: score:21 Chances: The Trade Desk Inc has strong potential for growth in the advertising technology sector. Ark Invest’s continued investment in The Trade Desk indicates confidence in the company’s future prospects. The company’s innovative technology platform and products position it well for long-term success in the industry.
